mapper.insert: INSERT INTO steel_wire_container_wash_process ( partial_id, process_type, process_time, lot_no, quantity, operator_id, material_id ) VALUES ( #{partial_id}, #{process_type}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, #{lot_no}, #{quantity}, #{operator_id}, #{material_id} )
mapper.select: SELECT m.material_id, COALESCE(m.omr_notifi_no, m.sorc_no) AS sorc_no, v_model.name AS model_name, m.level FROM material m JOIN v_model ON m.model_id = v_model.MODEL_ID LEFT JOIN process_assign_template ON m.pat_id = process_assign_template.process_assign_template_id WHERE m.inline_time IS NOT NULL AND m.outline_time IS NULL AND (m.level=1 OR process_assign_template.derive_kind=1) AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM material_partial WHERE material_id = m.material_id AND bo_flg<>7) AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM production_feature p1 JOIN position ON p1.position_id = position.position_id AND position.line_id = 14 WHERE p1.operate_result = 2 AND p1.material_id = m.material_id ) ORDER BY m.scheduled_date
